title: An ansvver to Dr. Stillingfleet's Mischief of separation being a letter written out of the countrey to a person of quality in the city. Who took offence at the late sermon of Dr. Stillingfleet, Dean of S. Pauls; before the lord mayor.
author: Howe, John, 1630-1705.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed by S.W. and sold by S. Tydmarsh, at the sign of the Kings Head in Cornhill, near the Royal Exchange,
